title: Bonus: Drop Us A Line - Have We Lost The World's Oldest Ham?
content:
Dan, James, and Andy sift through the correspondence sent in by listeners.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.

If you'd like to write in, you can email podcast@qi.com
